summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; ratifying the execution of a grant agreement with the Washington State Department of Community Trade and Economic development for a grant to support the development and implementation of the Seattle Teen Center (TLC) at the old Garfield Community Center; increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department's 1997 Budget; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
